thread.title: A perfect hotel to stay at
thread.title_full: A perfect hotel to stay at - Review of Hotel Le Littre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Einat W
title: A perfect hotel to stay at
text: I just spend the last 4 days in this hotel and had to write a review as it was just perfect. Beautiful and clean rooms, very good location, friendly staff.... everything that was needed to make this weekend in Paris just perfect. I really recommend this hotel and will surely come back in the near future.
